description:
This course is not about how to use Camtasia. You need to have basic knowledge of using camtasia. While I will show you how to use camtasia to produce animation video, this course is not on how to use camtasia, there is plenty of course that teach you how to use camtasia and this is not one of them.

Do you know that Animation Explainer video is the most effective way to sell or promote your company product or website. But producing a good animation video is not easy, there is many tools and software available to help us. But to learn such a tools is never easy.

In this course I will be focusing only on Camtasia Studio. Some of you already have camtasia studio and it is a popular screencast software where you can narrate and screen capture your computer screen and teach a course. How many of you know that you can do a animation using Camtasia alone. In this course you will learn that. And not only will I teach you how to use Camtasia studio to produce a animation video but you will also learn


- About time line and layers

- how to move body parts of animated character (moving hand, moving lips, moving eyes etc)

- how to make your character talk

- how to make popular touch screen hand movement

- how to make voice over in different language for free

- where to get background music absolutely free

- where to get sound effects for free

- where to get great cartoon character for free

The only piece of software you need is camtasia studio

Enroll Now I will see you in the class

As a bonus you get to download all the Character and image I use in the course for FREE. The whole file that I take time to create is over 70mb
title: Create Promo Explainer Animation Video using Camtasia only
